text.game.death_messages.enable: Death messages have been turned on for you.
text.game.death_messages.disable: Death messages have been turned off for you.
text.game.misc.lose_heat: Your heat has gone out, you can now be frozen!
text.game.item.avalanche.name: Avalanche!
text.game.item.avalanche.lore: Shoots out 5 snowballs that leave slowing snow on the ground in an area where it lands.
text.game.item.axe.name: Ice Pick
text.game.item.axe.lore: Hit an enemy with a full swing to instantly kill them.
text.game.item.axe.death: You were attacked by an Ice Pick!
text.game.item.blaze.name: Spawnfire
text.game.item.blaze.lore.0: Set up a camp that you respawn at when frozen, can be broken by enemies.
text.game.item.blaze.lore.1: Using will replace any other current campfires
text.game.item.blaze.use.fail: You must use the campfire while grounded
text.game.item.blaze.use.success: You set up a campfire, you can choose to respawn here when frozen
text.game.item.blaze.return.name: Return to Spawnfire
text.game.item.blaze.return.lore: Teleports you back to your spawnfire, using it up in the process.
text.game.item.bow.name: Snowy Sniper
text.game.item.bow.lore: Shoot enemies to freeze them and teammates to unfreeze them. Has 3 shots.
text.game.item.bow.arrow.name: Frost Bolt
text.game.item.crossbow.name: Hot Shot
text.game.item.crossbow.lore: Shoots an exploding shot that unfreezes teammates.
text.game.item.explosion.name: Siberian Ex-snow-sion
text.game.item.explosion.lore: Freezes enemies in a 6 block area around you but freezes yourself too.
text.game.item.glow.name: Glow Point
text.game.item.glow.lore.cp: Makes all enemies on the nearest control point glow.
text.game.item.glow.get_glowed: You are glowing, now all of China knows you're here!
text.game.item.hot_rod.name: Fire Rod
text.game.item.hot_rod.lore: Gives you back your heat for 3.5 seconds.
text.game.item.hot_rod.use: You are now heated for 3.5 seconds
text.game.item.icicle.name: Icicle
text.game.item.icicle.lore: Freezing an enemy by hitting them with this gives you two new items in return.
text.game.item.icicle.use: You got two new items by using the icicle
text.game.item.invis.name: Invisibility
text.game.item.invis.use: You are now invisible for 10 seconds
text.game.item.mystery.name: Mystery Box
text.game.item.mystery.lore: Spawns a temporary item giver that spawns 3 items.
text.game.item.mystery.used: Your Mystery Box has been used up
text.game.item.phoenix.name: Phoenix Ignition
text.game.item.phoenix.lore: Unfreeze all friends within 16 blocks of you, but you die in the process.
text.game.item.phoenix.use: You sacrificed yourself to revive your friends
text.game.item.snowman.name: Decoy Snowman
text.game.item.snowman.lore: Spawns a decoy snowman that counts as a player on control points.
text.game.item.speed.name: Speed Boost
text.game.item.speed.use: You now have speed III for 12 seconds
text.game.item.turtle.name: Glacierback
text.game.item.turtle.lore: Explodes when walked over by the enemy team. Blows up automatically after 20 seconds.
text.game.item.turtle.use.fail: The Glacierback must be placed on ground
text.game.item.whoaball.name: Whoaball
text.game.item.whoaball.lore: Throw it and freeze enemies in a 5 block area around where it lands.
text.game.item.generic.drop: Throw item to get rid of it.
